manage_page_categories.delete.not_empty_: It's not possible to delete page categories that contain pages
manage_page_categories.add.duplicate_err: It's not possible to add duplicate page categories
manage_page_categories.delete.uncategori: It's not possible to edit/delete the page category "Uncategorized"
manage_page_categories.edit.uncategorize: It's not possible to edit/delete the page category "Uncategorized"
